Installing third-party softwares¶

Various softwares can be accessed from Biopython when Epitopsy is loaded. The following pages describe the installation procedure for each of them.

  • Clustal Omega — Multiple Sequence Alignment
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
  • PDB2PQR — Generation of PQR files
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
  • APBS — Electrostatics
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
  • PyMOL — 3D molecular viewer
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
      • Troubleshooting
  • Gromacs — MD simulations
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
  • Amber — MD simulations
    • Installation procedure
      • For the impatients
      • Step-by-step installation
  • Sharing libraries
